name: BButton
sample: <BButton context={context} type='flat' text='Default' onClick={this._onclick.bind(this)} style={{ marginRight: '10px' }} />

infoArray.name: colorType
infoArray.desc: colorType is for setting primary or secondary color palettes. Can takes 'primary' or 'secondary' strings as values.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: To disable button this attribute should set to true

infoArray.name: fontIcon
infoArray.desc: The CSS class name of the root element.

infoArray.name: buttonStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the button element.

infoArray.name: fullWidth
infoArray.desc: If true, the button will take up the full width of its container.

infoArray.name: mini
infoArray.desc: Value for setting mini floating action buttons (type='floatingAction')

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: textPosition
infoArray.desc: Dont use this property! Value for setting text position releative to the icon. Can takes 'after' or 'before' as values

infoArray.name: textStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the text element.

infoArray.name: tooltip
infoArray.desc: The text to supply to the element's tooltip.

infoArray.name: type
infoArray.desc: The text to supply to the button type. Can takes 'flat' or 'raised' or 'fab' or 'icon' as values
